cu.explanation_en: Setting the NGU IP address to an invalid format will cause UPF connection failure and prevent NG-U interface setup.

du.explanation_en: Setting physical cell ID to a negative value (-1) will cause cell identification errors and prevent proper cell synchronization.
du.explanation_zh: 將實體細胞 ID 設定為負值 (-1)，會導致細胞識別錯誤，並阻止正確的細胞同步。
